mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, name_kana, nickname, email, area, birth_date, gender, remark, deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{nameKana}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course_name, start_date, expected_end_date) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{expectedEndDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET deleted = true WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE students SET deleted = false WHERE id = #{id}
